name: Potaton
description:
Welcome to Po-ta-ton! It is a side-scrolling adventure in where you are a monster eating food that gives you weird mutations in space. Gather as many mutations and points as possible, and survive for as long as you can!

You control the creature with W and S, for up and down.

Comment and tell us what you think about the game, and especially what your final creature ended up looking like!

We hope you enjoy our game!

Cool Stuff Studios

If you would want to contact us regarding the game, you can contact us on twitter: @PrimaDastina
